data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 20174, Version Hash: 04625290f5fdaf45ed5a94fa00f89b06c9e9a88b
data.actual_result: The entire member list goes grey, with no 'placeholders' to be seen.
data.expected_result: The users should not disappear, or should atleast stay as their blank profile, whilst loading.
data.short_description: The member list goes completely blank, when scrolling down initially on Firefox/Edge.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter Discord, on Microsoft Edge. - Find a server with large amounts of members. - Scroll down quickly, using the scroll bar, and dragging.
